name: The Fall of Alice
description:
Describes the current state of society, or it would if it wasn't a rushed Ludum Dare game made by two morons.

PRESS ANY KEY TO START

ANY KEY EXCEPT "P" THAT ONE IS FOR PAUSE

LEFT-RIGHT KEYS TO MOVE ABOUT

DOWN KEY TO SPEED UP

OH I ALMOST FORGOT, STAY ON THE PATH OF LETTERS TO GAIN SCORE

Made in impressive amount of time for Ludum Dare 48
